project_abstract.cdata: The project would complete the development of the Vuelta Grande retrograde gas condensate field through the drilling of six wells (2 production and 4 injection), the installation of a gas processing plant, and the laying of gathering lines and injection lines. In Vuelta Grande, all liquid hydrocarbons exist in gas form in the reservoir and appropriate reservoir pressure must be maintained in order to permit condensate production by recycling dry gas into the reservoir. The project would also provide studies of The Bolivian National Oil Company's (YPFB) staff policies and organizational efficiency as well as consultants services and training related to the recycling process.
